content: in knitpicks palette but you can use any yarn you like  trans pool 7 cotton candy 7 white 7 cotton candy 7 pool 8  genderqueer clover 12 white 12 aster 12  nonbinary black 9 majestic 9 white 9 semolina 9  agender black 5 silver 5 white 5 peapod 5 white 5 silver 5 black 6  genderfluid celestial 7 black 7 french lavender 7 white 7 cotton candy 8  maverique orange 12 white 12 semolina 12  intersex semolina 15 majestic 6 semolina 15  rainbow six stripes majestic 6 blue 6 grass 6 semolina 6 orange 6 hollyberry or pimento 6  rainbow philadelphia majestic 6 blue 4 grass 4 semolina 4 orange 4 hollyberry or pimento 4 bark 4 black 6  rainbow gilbert baker majestic 6 celestial 4 caribbean 4 grass 4 semolina 4 orange 4 hollyberry or pimento 4 cotton candy 6  bi jay 14 aster 8 fuschia 14  pan blue 12 semolina 12 fuschia 12  ace eggplant 9 white 9 ash 9 black 9  aro black 7 ash 7 white 7 peapod 7 grass 8  aroace 1 jay or celestial 7 pool 7 white 7 semolina 7 orange 8  aroace 2 eggplant 6 white 4 ash 4 black 4 ash 4 white 4 peapod 4 grass 6  lesbian mauve 7 tea rose 7 white 7 masala 7 sweet potato 8  demigender ash 5 silver 5 safflower 5 white 5 safflower 5 silver 5 ash 6  demigirl ash 5 silver 5 cotton candy 5 white 5 cotton candy 5 silver 5 ash 6  demiboy ash 5 silver 5 sky 5 white 5 sky 5 silver 5 ash 6  gay man jay 7 pool 7 white 7 sagebrush 7 teal 8  queerplatonic black 7 ash 7 white 7 cotton candy 7 safflower 8  other flags map the number and width of stripes onto 36 row some may not divide exactly lgbtq+ pride kippah/yarmulke © 2023 by krueger knitting is marked with cc0 1 0
